subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United will play in Toronto (July 16); Philadelphia (July 21); Kansas City, Mo. (July 25); Houston (July 28); and Guadalajara, Mexico (July 30) as part of a preseason North American tour.
snippet: Manchester United will play in Toronto (July 16); Philadelphia (July 21); Kansas City, Mo. (July 25); Houston (July 28); and Guadalajara, Mexico (July 30) as part of a preseason North American tour.
